plot: They say that if you force a fish to live inside a round fish tank it will end up blind eventually, after going through a crossed-eye.
title: Domingo por la Tarde
plot_es: They say that if you force a fish to live inside a round fish tank it will end up blind eventually, after going through a crossed-eye.
plot_en: They say that if you force a fish to live inside a round fish tank it will end up blind eventually, after going through a crossed-eye.
